name: Aztec restoration #9
description: Detail from plate 9 of the 16th century Aztec Codex Laud, depicting the Goddess Mayahuel squatting naked upon a snake and a tortoise in a position suggestive of childbirth. This is an allusion to an alternative name for her: She on the Turtle Bed. This alternate name is noted in a song dedicated to herâ€”a song sung to ease the pains associated with giving birth.
